front.title: ECDHE_PSK Ciphersuites for Transport Layer Security (TLS)

abstract.t: This document extends RFC 4279, RFC 4492 and RFC 4785, and specifies a set of cipher suites that use a pre-shared key (PSK) to authenticate an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman exchange (ECDH). These cipher suites provide Perfect Forward Secrecy (PFS).
